name: DestructiveBlueprints
title: Destructive Blueprints
author: Malte9799
description:
This mod adds the ability to place blueprints over existing buildings. Deconstruction is ordered for buildings that are in the way.
Usage: Press Ctrl (by default) and place a blueprint to demolish any buildings that stand in its way.

[color=red]Important Note:[/color] You can now build directily from Blueprint Libary, but the grid settings wont work.
(This is a limitation from the game. So nothing I can do)
